overturn.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if you overturn something, or if it overturns, it turns upside down or falls over on its side
overturn.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Leslie jumped to her feet, overturning her chair.
His car overturned, trapping him inside.
overturn.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to suddenly remove a government from power, especially by using violence
